      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type SimulationObject 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void SimulationController.addSimulationObject(SimulationObject obj)
      Add simulation object to the simulation Since we have only 3 parent class (Zombie, Soldier and Bullet) and only the bullet is not an abstract class, I have followed the algorithm: If the object's name is Bullet, add it to Bullet list If the object's superclass name is Soldier, soldier is abstract class, add it to the soldier list Last case is Zombie, same as Soldier
      void SimulationController.removeSimulationObject(SimulationObject obj)
      Makes the simulation object's active false
